PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-04622003-04-030,  TC,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I AND IV) by, inter alia, defining "basic ultra-light aeroplane" and redefining "ultra-light aeroplane" in commonly understood aviation terms, by inserting definitions for "dual instruction flight time" and "solo flight time", by allowing holders of a foreign licence to be part of the flight crew on a Canadian-registered aircraft and vice-versa, by affirming the Minister's authority to suspend or cancel a medical certificate, and by establishing a reporting system that will allow the Minister to monitor freelance flight training operations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0129 Publication Date: 2003-04-23
AttachmentsAttachment
